author: Elastic
description: Identifies attempts to clear or disable Windows event log stores using Windows wevetutil command. This is often done by attackers in an attempt to evade detection or destroy forensic evidence on a system.
name: Clearing Windows Event Logs
query:
process where event.type in ("process_started", "start") and
  (process.name : "wevtutil.exe" or process.pe.original_file_name == "wevtutil.exe") and
    process.args : ("/e:false", "cl", "clear-log") or
  process.name : "powershell.exe" and process.args : "Clear-EventLog"
